com.philips.cdp.digitalcare.listeners

Interface CcListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MicroAppFragmentActivity, MicroAppLauncher

    public interface CcListener
    This is the "ConsumerCare" Common interface used across the application to serve the Social Provider Click Listener , Supper Screen Button Click Listener & the ProductMenu Listener.

    Created by naveen@philips.com on 8/16/2016.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean onMainMenuItemClicked(java.lang.String mainMenuItem) 
      boolean onProductMenuItemClicked(java.lang.String productMenu)
      Returns the booleanValue onClick on the Products Menu
      boolean onSocialProviderItemClicked(java.lang.String socialProviderItem)
      Retuns the click event onPressing the respective SocialProvider Button.
